## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `isort` to organize imports
- [ ] I have run `black` to format code
- [ ] I have run `ruff check --fix` to lint code
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `docs/`
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

## Checklist Before Requesting Review

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/coff33ninja/LANRage/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have read the [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/coff33ninja/LANRage/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

- [ ] All tests pass locally
